EmailTemplate.name: FinalReport
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} has been Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Team, The {!Opportunity.Name} for {!OTC_SPA__c.Account_Name__c} has been approved by all team. Product Name: {!OTC_SPA__c.Product__c} SKU Count: {!OTC_SPA__c.SKU_Count__c} Price Intelligence: {!OTC_SPA__c.Price_Intelligence__c} Approval Status: {!OTC_SPA__c.Approval_Status__c}
